level.text: Be provided in fifteen (15) minute units;
Not be subject to annual service limits;
Be provided as either an individual or group intervention;

Be provided in a DMH-certified community mental health rehabilitation services agency, the client’s home or other community setting or a residential facility consisting of sixteen (16) beds or less; and
Meet all other requirements set forth in 22 DCMR ยง 3416.
Medication/Somatic treatment services shall not be billed on the same day as assertive community treatment.
